title: Diamond Cascading Vanki Pendant
features: Elegant cascading Vanki design, showcasing a layered arrangement of brilliant-cut diamonds. The piece is expertly crafted with a delicate and modern setting that maximizes the brilliance of each diamond. Inspired by the traditional Vanki armlet and translated into a contemporary necklace pendant
colors: Rose Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds
occasions: Suitable for both traditional and contemporary events. Perfect for weddings
or as a sophisticated statement piece for evening wear.
description: This Vanki pendant blends traditional design with modern elegance, making it a timeless and versatile piece. The high-quality diamonds and rose gold setting ensure lasting beauty and durability. A perfect expression of heritage and sophistication.
